```{r}
x <- c(NA, 1, 2, NA, 3)
sum(x)
sum(x, na.rm = TRUE)

v <- c(2, 1, 4, 3, 2, 3)
w <- 0
for (i in 2:5){
  w[i] <- v[i] + 1
}
print(w)

id <- c(1, 2, 3, 5, 6)
v1 <- c(3, 2, 3, 4, 5)
v2 <- c(5, 4, 3, 4)  
m1 <- as.data.frame(cbind(id, v1))  
names(m1) <- c("id", "v1")
m2 <- as.data.frame(cbind(id[-2], v2))  # removing this specific element
names(m2) <- c("id", "v2")
m3 <- as.data.frame(cbind(-id[2], v2))

m <- merge(m1, m2, by = "id")
print(m[, 2])
```
